name: mousetails
description:
This was made in 48 hours for Helsinki Pride Jam. Theme was icons/role models. There isn't much of it theme here but our grand idea was that you make your own heroes (or something like that) . Also this was our first ever game project so we're just happy that we made at least something that kinda works. 

Use WASD keys to move.

The game has no win state atm so just close the game when you reach the end :D 

Updates for this maybe coming in the future!

Team Witchlantern for this jam project was: aghoulprince (background and asset art) and abysska (character art and animation, coding)

music:

Dark Fog Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
